agency_desc: A national nonprofit organization that provides information and counseling regarding Sudden Infant Death Syndrome.
service_name: GRIEF HOTLINE FOR SUDDEN INFANT DEATH SYNDROME
service_description: Provides a 24-hour hotline that connects grief counselors to people who have experienced a stillbirth or death of a baby due to Sudden Infant Death Syndrome (SIDS) or Sudden Unexpected Infant Death (SUID).
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Call and ask to speak to a grief counselor; visit the website for more information. www.firstcandle.org
site_eligibility: Callers who have experienced a stillbirth or death of a baby due to SIDS or SUID

agency_desc: A national nonprofit organization that provides information and counseling regarding Sudden Infant Death Syndrome.
service_description: Provides information and advice to parents, professionals, and other interested persons on keeping babies healthy and safe during pregnancy and through the first year of life. Information includes safe sleep and swaddling practices, caregiver education, and pacifier use. Also provides information on stillbirths, sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS), and other sudden unexpected infant deaths (SUID).
site_details: Call or visit the website for information. www.firstcandle.org
